battleship

Class OppBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • battleship.OppBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class OppBoard
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Class for the opponent's board where user's target tand fire upon opponent's ships. The board is made up of button type's and uses a 12x11 gridlayout.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Parker
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
